  <script id="newscorpau-vars">
   var newscorpau = newscorpau || {};
newscorpau.site = "heraldsun";
newscorpau.device = "desktop";
newscorpau.pagetype = "homepage";
newscorpau.environment = "prod";


newscorpau.subscribeUrl = "https://www.heraldsun.com.au/subscribe/news/1/?int_medium=display&int_source=site-link&int_campaign=acq_onsite_login&int_content=link&sourceCode=";
newscorpau.sourceCodeMap = "HS";
newscorpau.coralcomments = {};
newscorpau.coralcomments.url = "https://mhr.talk.news.com.au/static/embed.js";
newscorpau.coralcomments.talk = "https://mhr.talk.news.com.au";
newscorpau.c3po = {};
newscorpau.c3po.enabled = true;
  </script>
  <script>
   const isiPad = (navigator.platform === 'MacIntel' && navigator.maxTouchPoints > 1);
if (isiPad) {
    document.querySelector('html').setAttribute('data-device-type', 'ipad');

    //- Changing call to a relative link because beta URLs are causing problems.
    let siteURL = '';
    //let siteURL = `https://www.${newscorpau.site}${newscorpau.environment === 'prod' ? '' : newscorpau.environment}.com.au`;
    //- if (newscorpau.environment === 'local') {
    //-     siteURL = `http://${newscorpau.site}.local`;
    //- }

    fetch(`${siteURL}/spp-api/v1/template/?path=layouts.whitelabel.mobile-nav&render=phug`)
    .then(response => {
        return response.text();
    })
    .then(text => {
        let navCSS = document.createElement('link');
        navCSS.setAttribute('rel', 'stylesheet');
        navCSS.setAttribute('href', `${siteURL}/wp-content/themes/newscorpau-news-dna/dist/stylesheets/css-mobile-nav.css`);
        document.head.appendChild(navCSS);
        let nav = document.createElement('div');
        nav.innerHTML = text;
        document.body.appendChild(nav);
    })
    .then(() => {
        let hamburger = `<div class="hamburger"><div class="icon-sprite-item" style="width: 16px; height: 16px"><svg><use xlink:href="#hamburger"></use></svg></div><div class="icon-sprite-item" style="width: 16px; height: 16px"><svg><use xlink:href="#cross"></use></svg></div></div>`;
        document.querySelector('nav.navigation').innerHTML += hamburger;
        let backdrop = document.createElement('div');
        backdrop.classList.add('backdrop');
        document.body.appendChild(backdrop);
        let navJS = document.createElement('script');
        navJS.setAttribute('src', `${siteURL}/wp-content/themes/newscorpau-news-dna/dist/javascripts/js-navigation-mobile.js`);
        document.head.appendChild(navJS);
    });

}
  </script>

  <script type="text/javascript">
   window.utag_data = window.utag_data || {};
    window.utag_data.newskey = "4da2619aac12103a273f215682d86053";
    (function(){
        var qs = location.search;
        var pn = location.pathname;
        qs=qs.replace(/\?nk=[^&]*&/,'?');
        qs=qs.replace(/&nk=[^&]*&/g,'&');
        qs=qs.replace(/&nk=.*$/,'');
        qs=qs.replace(/\?nk=.*$/,'');
        if (qs != location.search || pn != location.pathname) {
            // Modern browsers, don't refresh, just get rid of the affecting parameters
            if (window.history && history.replaceState) {
                history.replaceState({}, '', location.href.replace(location.pathname, pn).replace(location.search, qs));
            }
        }
    })();
  </script>

       <path d="M14.543 12.398a.326.326 0 00-.332.326v.823l-.715-.405a.33.33 0 00-.45.118.32.32 0 00.119.444l.715.405-.689.392a.32.32 0 00-.119.444c.066.104.172.17.292.17a.31.31 0 00.159-.04l1.02-.587 1.801 1.019-1.775 1.005-1.06-.6a.33.33 0 00-.45.117.32.32 0 00.12.444l.728.405-.729.405a.32.32 0 00-.12.444c.067.105.173.17.292.17.053 0 .12-.013.16-.04l.715-.404v.797c0 .183.145.326.33.326a.326.326 0 00.332-.326v-1.163l1.802-1.019v2.012l-1.06.6a.32.32 0 00-.12.445.35.35 0 00.292.17c.053 0 .12-.013.16-.04l.728-.404v.822c0 .183.145.327.33.327a.326.326 0 00.332-.327v-.81l.702.392c.053.027.106.04.16.04a.32.32 0 00.29-.17.32.32 0 00-.119-.444l-1.033-.588v-2.038l1.762 1.006v1.202c0 .183.146.326.331.326a.326.326 0 00.331-.326v-.823l.729.405a.358.358 0 00.159.039.32.32 0 00.291-.17.32.32 0 00-.119-.444l-.715-.405.702-.392a.32.32 0 00.12-.444.33.33 0 00-.451-.118l-1.034.588-1.801-1.019 1.775-1.005 1.06.6c.053.027.106.04.159.04a.32.32 0 00.291-.17.32.32 0 00-.12-.444l-.728-.405.729-.405a.32.32 0 00.12-.444.33.33 0 00-.451-.118l-.716.405v-.797a.326.326 0 00-.33-.326.326.326 0 00-.332.326V13.9l-1.802 1.019v-2.012l1.06-.6a.32.32 0 00.12-.445.33.33 0 00-.451-.117l-.729.404v-.822a.326.326 0 00-.33-.327.326.326 0 00-.332.327v.81l-.702-.392a.33.33 0 00-.45.117.32.32 0 00.119.444l1.033.588v2.05l-1.775-1.018v-1.202a.334.334 0 00-.331-.326z" fill="#1691DB">
       </path>
      </g>
     </symbol>
    </defs>
   </svg>
  </div>
  <div class="pixel-track">
   <div class="pixel-track_sticky-leader-ad">
   </div>
  </div>

         <article class="storyblock" data-article-id="3fa47674575a9bc0bb064bd849772d9a" data-nca-asset-type="story" data-storyblock-imagesize="block_mid_image" data-storyblock-layout="stacked">
          <span class="storyblock_meta">
           <span class="storyblock_meta">
            <a class="storyblock_section g_font-base-s" href="/sport/afl">
             AFL
            </a>
           </span>
           <time class="storyblock_datetime g_font-base-s" datetime="2021-03-21T06:38:00+11:00">
           </time>
          </span>
          <h4 class="storyblock_title">
           <a class="storyblock_title_link" data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="tops-1" data-tgev-label="story" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="1" data-word-match="" href="https://www.heraldsun.com.au/sport/afl/essendon-v-hawthorn-bombers-debutant-nik-cox-on-report-for-high-hit/news-story/3fa47674575a9bc0bb064bd849772d9a">
            How Bombers blew 39-point lead in stunner
           </a>
          </h4>
          <a class="storyblock_image_link" data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="tops-1" data-tgev-label="story" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="1" href="https://www.heraldsun.com.au/sport/afl/essendon-v-hawthorn-bombers-debutant-nik-cox-on-report-for-high-hit/news-story/3fa47674575a9bc0bb064bd849772d9a">
           <div class="responsive-img" data-desiredimagesize="block_mid_image" style="padding-bottom:75%">
            <img alt="MELBOURNE, AUSTRALIA - MARCH 20: Mason Redman of the Bombers is tackled by Jaeger O'Meara of the Hawks during the round one AFL match between the Essendon Bombers and the Hawthorn Hawks at Marvel Stadium on March 20, 2021 in Melbourne, Australia.            </div>
          </a>
          <p class="storyblock_standfirst g_font-body-s">
           Essendon coach, Ben Rutten said he side tried to be a bit too cute against Hawthorn and paid the ultimate price after blowing a huge lead. What went wrong?
          </p>

         </article>
         <article class="storyblock" data-article-id="fc4a296679ee444a847fb1a78462bc94" data-nca-asset-type="story" data-storyblock-imagesize="thumbnail" data-storyblock-layout="thumb-image-right">
          <span class="storyblock_meta">
           <span class="storyblock_meta">
            <a class="storyblock_section g_font-base-s" href="/news/victoria">
             Victoria
            </a>
           </span>
           <time class="storyblock_datetime g_font-base-s" datetime="2021-03-21T07:00:00+11:00">
           </time>
          </span>
          <h4 class="storyblock_title">
           <a class="storyblock_title_link" data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="tops-1" data-tgev-label="story" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="2" data-word-match="" href="https://www.heraldsun.com.au/news/victoria/bendigo-boy-survives-severe-asthma-attack-after-being-lifeless-for-more-than-40-minutes/news-story/fc4a296679ee444a847fb1a78462bc94">
            My sons dead: Boys heart stops for 40 minutes
           </a>
          </h4>
          <a class="storyblock_image_link" data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="tops-1" data-tgev-label="story" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="2" href="https://www.heraldsun.com.au/news/victoria/bendigo-boy-survives-severe-asthma-attack-after-being-lifeless-for-more-than-40-minutes/news-story/fc4a296679ee444a847fb1a78462bc94">
           <div class="responsive-img" data-desiredimagesize="thumbnail" style="padding-bottom:75%">
            <img alt="Brock Riddoch, 12, with cousin Flynn, loved motorbike riding before suffering a severe asthma attack.
** FOR SUNDAY HERALD SUN 21/3/2021 NO NEWS.COM.AU **" class="responsive-img_img storyblock_img" height="75" sizes="150px" src="https://content.api.news/v3/images/bin/69f003d7500372aac8b807eff5d5cd8f" srcset="https://content.api.news/v3/images/bin/69f003d7500372aac8b807eff5d5cd8f?width=150 150w, https://content.api.news/v3/images/bin/69f003d7500372aac8b807eff5d5cd8f?width=320 320w, https://content.api.news/v3/images/bin/69f003d7500372aac8b807eff5d5cd8f?width=650 650w, https://content.api.news/v3/images/bin/69f003d7500372aac8b807eff5d5cd8f?width=1024 1024w" width="100"/>
           </div>
          </a>
          <p class="storyblock_standfirst g_font-body-s">
           Twelve-year-old Brock was at school camp when an asthma attack stopped his heart for more than 40 minutes  and his parents heard it all over the phone.
          </p>
          <div class="storyblock_footer">
           <div class="storyblock_comments">

          </div>
         </article>
        </div>
        <div class="metro-tops_left">
         <article class="storyblock" data-article-id="2ea32207945eec13990dfe1315e5da82" data-nca-asset-type="story" data-storyblock-imagesize="thumbnail" data-storyblock-layout="thumb-image-right">
          <span class="storyblock_meta">
           <span class="storyblock_meta">
            <a class="storyblock_section g_font-base-s" href="/sport/motor-sport/formula-one">

            </a>
           </span>

          </span>
          <h4 class="storyblock_title">
           <a class="storyblock_title_link" data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="tops-1" data-tgev-label="story" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="3" data-word-match="" href="https://www.heraldsun.com.au/sport/motor-sport/formula-one/formula-one-stars-should-have-been-lighting-up-the-track-at-albert-park-on-sunday-but-instead-race-organisers-are-in-planning-for-a-november-event-here-is-the-latest/news-story/2ea32207945eec13990dfe1315e5da82">
            Revealed: How F1 will return to Melbourne
           </a>
          </h4>
          <a class="storyblock_image_link" data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="tops-1" data-tgev-label="story" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="3" href="https://www.heraldsun.com.au/sport/motor-sport/formula-one/formula-one-stars-should-have-been-lighting-up-the-track-at-albert-park-on-sunday-but-instead-race-organisers-are-in-planning-for-a-november-event-here-is-the-latest/news-story/2ea32207945eec13990dfe1315e5da82">
           <div class="responsive-img" data-desiredimagesize="thumbnail" style="padding-bottom:75%">
            <img alt="BAHRAIN, BAHRAIN - MARCH 12: Lando Norris of Great Britain and McLaren F1 and Daniel Ricciardo of Australia and McLaren F1 stand on the grid during Day One of F1 Testing at Bahrain International Circuit on March 12, 2021 in Bahrain, Bahrain.            </div>
          </a>
          <p class="storyblock_standfirst g_font-body-s">
           As the Albert Park track lays silent for the second straight year, more details have been given about how Daniel Ricciardo and co will return later this year.
          </p>

            Why solo learner drivers could soon face jail
           </a>
          </h4>
          <a class="storyblock_image_link" data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="tops-1" data-tgev-label="story" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="5" href="https://www.heraldsun.com.au/truecrimeaustralia/police-courts-victoria/new-laws-could-send-solo-learner-drivers-to-prison/news-story/e37d155b774a4bd03cd30544c8f1cf17">

           </div>
          </a>
          <p class="storyblock_standfirst g_font-body-s">
           About 5000 learner drivers are busted driving unaccompanied every year  but under new laws they could face jail time.

        <h4 class="storyblock_title">
         <a class="storyblock_title_link" data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="tops-3" data-tgev-label="story" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="1" data-word-match="" href="https://www.heraldsun.com.au/business/barefoot-investor/barefoot-investor-how-a-new-debt-helpline-is-the-lifeline-many-need/news-story/6304ba05a39a651f87899e063f604889">
          This new debt helpline is the lifeline many need
         </a>
        </h4>
        <p class="storyblock_standfirst g_font-body-s">
         Owning a small business can be lonely, but most of Australias employers are family-run operations. Now, finally, help is at hand.
        </p>

       <article class="storyblock" data-article-id="fc23755f96bade51ccb44ad2f4fb7a35" data-nca-asset-type="story" data-storyblock-imagesize="block_wide_image" data-storyblock-layout="stacked">
        <a class="storyblock_image_link" data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="tops-3" data-tgev-label="story" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="2" href="https://www.heraldsun.com.au/news/victoria/shoddy-neglected-vline-disruptions-sting-taxpayers/news-story/fc23755f96bade51ccb44ad2f4fb7a35">

        <span class="storyblock_meta">
         <span class="storyblock_meta">
          <a class="storyblock_section g_font-base-s" href="/news/victoria">
           Victoria
          </a>
         </span>
         <time class="storyblock_datetime g_font-base-s" datetime="2021-03-21T07:00:00+11:00">
         </time>
        </span>
        <h4 class="storyblock_title">
         <a class="storyblock_title_link" data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="tops-3" data-tgev-label="story" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="2" data-word-match="" href="https://www.heraldsun.com.au/news/victoria/shoddy-neglected-vline-disruptions-sting-taxpayers/news-story/fc23755f96bade51ccb44ad2f4fb7a35">
          Shoddy, neglected: V/Line disruptions sting taxpayers
         </a>
        </h4>
        <p class="storyblock_standfirst g_font-body-s">
         Replacement cabs for passengers left stranded by struggling V/Line services have cost taxpayers hundreds of thousands of dollars.
        </p>
        <div class="storyblock_footer">

        <h4 class="storyblock_title">
         <a class="storyblock_title_link" data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="tops-3" data-tgev-label="story" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="3" data-word-match="" href="https://www.heraldsun.com.au/coronavirus/victorias-vaccine-program-off-to-a-flying-start/news-story/27bc572036f89df60f40407b68a3f01c">
          Vaccine program off to flying start; only one active case
         </a>
        </h4>
        <p class="storyblock_standfirst g_font-body-s">
         The number of COVID vaccines administered in Victoria has far exceeded targets. Meanwhile, just one active case remains in the state.
        </p>

       <h3 class="g_font-title-xs">
        <a data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="local" data-tgev-label="header-local" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="0" href="/leader?c3ponofollow">

       <article class="storyblock" data-article-id="a4a48acc9e7d8ae6251dd124ac7ac992" data-nca-asset-type="story" data-storyblock-imagesize="block_wide_image" data-storyblock-layout="stacked">
        <a class="storyblock_image_link" data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="local" data-tgev-label="story" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="1" href="https://www.heraldsun.com.au/leader/bass-coast/phillip-island-food-kims-bakehouse-and-chinos-take-away-fish-and-chips-destroyed/news-story/a4a48acc9e7d8ae6251dd124ac7ac992">

        <span class="storyblock_meta">

         <time class="storyblock_datetime g_font-base-s" datetime="2021-03-20T12:23:00+11:00">
         </time>
        </span>
        <h4 class="storyblock_title">
         <a class="storyblock_title_link" data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="local" data-tgev-label="story" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="1" data-word-match="" href="https://www.heraldsun.com.au/leader/bass-coast/phillip-island-food-kims-bakehouse-and-chinos-take-away-fish-and-chips-destroyed/news-story/a4a48acc9e7d8ae6251dd124ac7ac992">
          Fire engulfs Cowes takeaway shops
         </a>
        </h4>
        <p class="storyblock_standfirst g_font-body-s">
         Two Phillip Island takeaway shops have been destroyed after a blaze broke out in the popular tourist town.
        </p>

        </a>
        <span class="storyblock_meta">
         <span class="storyblock_meta">

          </a>

         <time class="storyblock_datetime g_font-base-s" datetime="2021-03-20T06:00:00+11:00">
         </time>
        </span>
        <h4 class="storyblock_title">
         <a class="storyblock_title_link" data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="local" data-tgev-label="story" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="2" data-word-match="" href="https://www.heraldsun.com.au/leader/east/hunted-antiques-market-fair-ferntree-gully-melbournes-best-antique-stores-and-markets/news-story/d43dea5b2828e72a2fd631101cc1481b">
          Where to find Melbournes best vintage treasures
         </a>
        </h4>
        <p class="storyblock_standfirst g_font-body-s">
         From antiques and collectibles in Kilsyth, to retro clothing in Fitzroy, bargain hunters are spoiled for choice.
        </p>
        <div class="storyblock_footer">

        <h4 class="storyblock_title">
         <a class="storyblock_title_link" data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="premium-promos-2" data-tgev-label="story" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="1" data-word-match="" href="https://www.heraldsun.com.au/news/world/prince-harry-reveals-dianas-death-left-a-huge-hole-in-new-book/news-story/a1d91656e2d42223f2f0eabfaf8f086c">
          It left a huge hole
         </a>
        </h4>
        <p class="storyblock_standfirst g_font-body-s">
         Prince Harry has poured his heart out about the death of his mother, Diana.
        </p>
       </article>
       <article class="storyblock" data-article-id="3a10d2d8ebe9c7914ba58ecb6bc330c9" data-nca-asset-type="promo" data-storyblock-imagesize="block_square_image" data-storyblock-layout="fastnews">
        <a class="storyblock_image_link" data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="premium-promos-2" data-tgev-label="story" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="2" href="https://www.heraldsun.com.au/news/opinion/james-campbell-australia-has-friends-willing-to-help-it-stand-up-to-china-again/news-story/9c865bcfb55877bdcf4e8942faab1b0a">
         <div class="responsive-img" data-desiredimagesize="block_square_image" style="padding-bottom:100%">
          <img alt="" class="responsive-img_img storyblock_img lazyload" data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://content.api.news/v3/images/bin/ee3a4770c961832ba8725a0c550348ed" data-srcset="https://content.api.news/v3/images/bin/ee3a4770c961832ba8725a0c550348ed?width=150 150w, https://content.api.news/v3/images/bin/ee3a4770c961832ba8725a0c550348ed?width=320 320w, https://content.api.news/v3/images/bin/ee3a4770c961832ba8725a0c550348ed?width=650 650w, https://content.api.news/v3/images/bin/ee3a4770c961832ba8725a0c550348ed?width=1024 1024w" height="768" width="768"/>
         </div>
        </a>
        <h4 class="storyblock_title">
         <a class="storyblock_title_link" data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="premium-promos-2" data-tgev-label="story" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="2" data-word-match="" href="https://www.heraldsun.com.au/news/opinion/james-campbell-australia-has-friends-willing-to-help-it-stand-up-to-china-again/news-story/9c865bcfb55877bdcf4e8942faab1b0a">
          Aussie friends will stand up to China
         </a>
        </h4>
        <p class="storyblock_standfirst g_font-body-s">
         Joe Bidens administration is showing it would stand up for Australia against China.
        </p>
       </article>

    <div class="widget widget_newscorpau_capi_sync_collection" id="newscorpau_capi_sync_collection-12">
     <div class="mosaic m3-3m opinions" data-nca-collection-id="1abca754f72f43107fc175152478041b" data-nca-edit-widget="newscorpau_capi_sync_collection-12">
      <div class="mosaic-heading mosaic_title m3-3m">
       <h3 class="g_font-title-xs">
        <a data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="opinion" data-tgev-label="header-opinion" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="0" href="https://www.heraldsun.com.au/news/opinion?c3ponofollow">
         Opinion
        </a>
       </h3>
       <div class="mosaic-heading_meta mosaic-heading_meta_c3po">
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="m3-3m_list">
       <article class="storyblock" data-article-id="46f39fbabfc8146d1312b04e0e30493d" data-nca-asset-type="story" data-storyblock-imagesize="block_author_thumbnail" data-storyblock-layout="opinion">

        <h4 class="storyblock_title">
         <a class="storyblock_title_link" data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="business" data-tgev-label="story" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="1" data-word-match="" href="https://www.heraldsun.com.au/business/why-victorias-portland-aluminium-smelter-wont-survive-the-decade/news-story/4921c364ca353da1e17a3ebaac06e7e6">
          Why Portland wont survive the decade
         </a>
        </h4>
        <a class="storyblock_image_link" data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="business" data-tgev-label="story" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="1" href="https://www.heraldsun.com.au/business/why-victorias-portland-aluminium-smelter-wont-survive-the-decade/news-story/4921c364ca353da1e17a3ebaac06e7e6">

          <img alt="PORTLAND, VICTORIA, AUSTRALIA - NewsWire Photos MARCH 19, 2021.

          Richest 250: How billionaire recluse made his fortune
         </a>
        </h4>
        <a class="storyblock_image_link" data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="business" data-tgev-label="story" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="3" href="https://www.heraldsun.com.au/business/richest-250-anthony-pratt-tops-nsws-richest-people-list-in-2021/news-story/7206d811616a41cab521fd7b2bc2c5fc">

         </div>

        <p class="storyblock_standfirst g_font-body-s">
         One of Victorias richest people made his fortune by selling plumbing supplies. Now hes worth $6.6b. See the full list of Victorias richest people here.
        </p>

    <div class="widget widget_newscorpau_capi_sync_collection" id="newscorpau_capi_sync_collection-14">
     <div class="mosaic m4-4m" data-nca-collection-id="" data-nca-edit-widget="newscorpau_capi_sync_collection-14">
      <div class="mosaic-heading mosaic_title m4-4m">
       <h3 class="g_font-title-xs">
        <a data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="real-estate" data-tgev-label="header-real-estate" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="0" href="/real-estate">
         Real Estate
        </a>
       </h3>
       <div class="mosaic-heading_meta mosaic-heading_meta_c3po">
        <span class="sub-branding-logo m4-4m">
         <a class="responsive-img" data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="real-estate" data-tgev-label="header-real-estate" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="0" href="https://www.realestate.com.au/">
          <div class="responsive-img" data-desiredimagesize="block_mid_image" style="padding-bottom:NAN%">
           <img alt="realestate.com.au" class="responsive-img_img" sizes="(max-width: 600px) 100vw, (max-width: 1000px) 33vw, 650px" src="https://s1.rui.au.reastatic.net/rui-static/img/rea-logo-v4.png"/>
          </div>
         </a>
        </span>
        <div class="c3po-button-placeholder g_font-base-s" data-facetid="/real-estate" data-followedfromdomain="heraldsun.com.au" data-layout="follow" data-name="Real Estate" data-type="route">

          Follow
         </button>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>

         <time class="storyblock_datetime g_font-base-s" datetime="2021-03-20T19:16:00+11:00">

        </span>
        <h4 class="storyblock_title">
         <a class="storyblock_title_link" data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="entertainment" data-tgev-label="story" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="3" data-word-match="" href="https://www.heraldsun.com.au/news/world/how-ralph-and-russo-collapsed-after-finding-fame-in-dressing-meghan-markle-kylie-and-beyonce/news-story/106f0f4568955a599cd1628695eb9021">
          Meghans Aussie designer turned to billionaire before going bust
         </a>
        </h4>
        <p class="storyblock_standfirst g_font-body-s">
         This Aussie power couple dressed Meghan Markle, but they went to another billionaire for help before their business went bust.
        </p>
        <div class="storyblock_footer">
         <div class="storyblock_comments">
          <div class="icon-sprite-item" style="width: 16px; height: 16px">
           <svg>
            <use xlink:href="#comment">
            </use>
           </svg>
          </div>
          <span class="storyblock_comment-count_count g_font-base-s" data-comment-count-post-id="106f0f4568955a599cd1628695eb9021">
           0
          </span>
         </div>
         <time class="storyblock_datetime g_font-base-s" datetime="2021-03-20T19:16:00+11:00">
         </time>
        </div>
       </article>
       <article class="storyblock" data-article-id="97bd6b9e567fe487ec737526a40bdec9" data-nca-asset-type="story" data-storyblock-imagesize="block_wide_image" data-storyblock-layout="stacked">
        <a class="storyblock_image_link" data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="entertainment" data-tgev-label="story" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="4" href="https://www.heraldsun.com.au/entertainment/fiona-byrne/daryl-somers-hey-hey-its-saturday-wouldnt-survive-todays-tv-cancel-culture/news-story/97bd6b9e567fe487ec737526a40bdec9">
         <div class="responsive-img" data-desiredimagesize="block_wide_image" style="padding-bottom:56.25%">
          <img alt="Daryl Somers will host Dancing With The  Stars All Stars for Channel 7 in 2021.

         <time class="storyblock_datetime g_font-base-s" datetime="2021-03-20T18:03:00+11:00">

        <h4 class="storyblock_title">
         <a class="storyblock_title_link" data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="entertainment" data-tgev-label="story" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="4" data-word-match="" href="https://www.heraldsun.com.au/entertainment/fiona-byrne/daryl-somers-hey-hey-its-saturday-wouldnt-survive-todays-tv-cancel-culture/news-story/97bd6b9e567fe487ec737526a40bdec9">
          Hey Hey would be axed today, Somers says
         </a>
        </h4>
        <p class="storyblock_standfirst g_font-body-s">
         TV legend Daryl Somers says TV is being dulled down and cancel culture would make it impossible for a show like Hey Hey Its Saturday to survive today.
        </p>

         <time class="storyblock_datetime g_font-base-s" datetime="2021-03-19T15:40:00+11:00">

        </span>
        <h4 class="storyblock_title">
         <a class="storyblock_title_link" data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="sport-1" data-tgev-label="story" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="2" data-word-match="" href="https://www.heraldsun.com.au/sport/motor-sport/sandown-supercars-david-reynolds-on-life-after-erebus-split/news-story/34a556509d173ac9553da3a707476274">
          Van Gisbergen defies pain to achieve 56-year-first
         </a>
        </h4>
        <p class="storyblock_standfirst g_font-body-s">
         It was a remarkable achievement for Shane van Gisbergen to even make it to the starting grid. But his drive at Sandown on Saturday is one for the history books.
        </p>

        <h4 class="storyblock_title">
         <a class="storyblock_title_link" data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="sport-2" data-tgev-label="story" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="4" data-word-match="" href="https://www.heraldsun.com.au/sport/afl/news/north-melbourne-greats-are-fed-up-with-the-outdated-and-disrespectful-views-about-their-club/news-story/d60eb31e0eb08d518409bb75cb5c6a85">
          Respect the rebuild: North greats sick of outdated opinion
         </a>
        </h4>
        <p class="storyblock_standfirst g_font-body-s">
         North Melbourne isnt the financially-strapped club it once was and club greats are fed up. They speak out on where the club is at, the new coach and the next captain.
        </p>

              </h4>
             </article>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>

           <div class="mosaic m3-l2l" data-nca-collection-id="d6c762af7b37466467e2ede5281547cd" data-nca-edit-widget="newscorpau_capi_sync_collection-23">

             <h3 class="g_font-title-xs">
              <a data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="escape" data-tgev-label="header-escape" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="0" href="https://www.escape.com.au">
               Escape
              </a>
             </h3>
             <div class="mosaic-heading_meta mosaic-heading_meta_c3po">
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="m3-l2l_list">
             <article class="storyblock" data-article-id="e6cb9b1326bd76b339ec66a71143dd02" data-nca-asset-type="promo" data-storyblock-imagesize="block_mid_image" data-storyblock-layout="list">

              </a>
